card.name: Athena
card.property: Failure: Choose a gear and place it face down beneath Athena. When you score Athena, you may pay 2 power. If you do, place one gear beneath her into your villain score pile, and shuffle Athena into your deck instead. (Place the other gears in your opponent's discard pile.)

card.name: Henry Wallace
card.property: Each time you assign Henry Wallace, you may pay 1 power. If you do, choose a support character. They are blocked, and Henry Wallace gets Science +X, where X is equal to the chosen character's Science.

card.name: James Coolidge
card.property: James Coolidge gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1 for each assigned character with a glyph. When you score James Coolidge, you may take a card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Nagato
card.property: Each time you assign Nagato, you may destroy an assigned or stopped support character whose cost is equal to or lower than the number of other Jaffa villain cards at the current mission.

card.name: Navigator Prior
card.property: When you play Navigator Prior, you may search your deck for an Ori ship. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. While Navigator Prior is assigned, you get total firepower +1 in each ship battle.

card.name: Reese
card.property: Reese gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1 for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Riv'ak
card.property: While Riv'ak is assigned, each time you play a Jaffa obstacle, your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Sokar
card.property: Sokar gets difficulty +1 for each assigned character without a glyph. Each time you pay Sokar's revive cost, the cards are purged instead of placed in your discard pile.

card.name: Tanith
card.property: Dominion. Goa'uld Vassal. Tanith gets difficulty +1 when assigned with another Goa'uld adversary.

card.name: Tenat and Jub
card.property: Outlaw, While Tenat and Jub are ready, each time your opponent would stop or destroy another card with outlaw, you may destroy them. If you do, prevent that effect from happening.

card.name: Tormentor Prior
card.property: While the current mission is a Culture or Combat mission, Tormentor Prior gets: "Stop Tormentor Prior, pay 3 power - Incapacitate a stopped team character."

card.name: Tyr
card.property: While Tyr is assigned, he gets: "Discard X villain cards - Play an obstacle. That obstacle gets power -X to play. You can do this only once each turn."

card.name: Tyre
card.property: Wraith Vassal. Tyre is blocked while you do not have a Wraith adversary. Tyre gets difficulty +1 while assigned with no other adversary.

card.name: Wraith Corruptor
card.property: Each time you assign Wraith Corruptor, you may wound a character. Then, you may pay 1 power. If you do, you may act again. Each time you revive Wraith Corruptor, you may wound a character.

card.name: Alicia Vega
card.property: Failure: Destroy Alicia Vega.

card.name: Balik
card.property: Each time you play an Ingenuity mission, you may stop Balik. If you don't, that mission gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Bragi
card.property: Success: Your opponent discards two cards at random.

card.name: Chepovetsky
card.property: When Chepovetsky is destroyed, you may search your hand and deck for another copy of him, play him at no cost, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Cor'ak
card.property: At the end of any mission, destroy Cor'ak (even if he is not assigned).

card.name: David Swift
card.property: Each time you play a gear, David Swift gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Dusty Mehra
card.property: When you play Dusty Mehra, the current mission gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Egeria
card.property: Egeria can't be assigned. Tok'ra support characters cost power -1 to play. Destroy Egeria - Choose a Tok'ra support character who gets Culture +3 and Science +3 and will be destroyed at the end of the chosen mission.

card.name: Eir
card.property: Stop Eir, pay 3 power - You may destroy a Disease obstacle on a character. Then, ready that character.

card.name: Kar'yn
card.property: To assign Kar'yn, you must purge either one Jaffa card or any three cards from your discard pile.

card.name: Liandra
card.property: Stop and destroy Liandra, pay 2 power - Destroy a Goa'uld adversary.

card.name: Natalia Orminski
card.property: Each time you play a mission, you may stop Natalia Orminski and pay 1 power. If you do, move the mission to the failed mission row and play a new mission at no cost.

card.name: Nav'ar
card.property: Grit. Nav'ar costs power -1 to play for each assigned Jaffa team character with a glyph.

card.name: Per'sus
card.property: To play Per'sus, you must stop a Tok'ra character, or any number of characters with a total of 3 Culture or more.

card.name: Raynolds
card.property: When you play Raynolds, he gets either Science +2 or Ingenuity +2 (you choose) until the end of the turn.

card.name: Shevchenko
card.property: Grit. Shevchenko is blocked during the first mission you play each turn.

card.name: Tasia
card.property: Stop and destroy Tasia - Search your mission pile for a Combat mission, reveal it, shuffle the rest of your mission pile, and place the searched mission on top of it.

card.name: Alison Porter
card.property: Alison Porter gets skills +1 for each different glyph she has that at least one other character has.

card.name: Anise
card.property: Libra, stop Anise, pay 2 power - Ready another stopped team character. Libra and Scorpius: Each time Anise's first ability targets a Tok'ra or SGC team character, you may ready her.

card.name: Anne Teldy
card.property: Libra: Each support character with 1 Ingenuity or more gets Ingenuity +1. Scorpius: Each support character with 1 Combat or more gets Combat +1. Libra and Scorpius: Each time you assign Anne Teldy, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a support character.

card.name: Bra'tac
card.property: Each time you assign Bra'tac to a mission with a glyph matching one of his, you may play a Jaffa support character. That character costs power -1 to play for each different glyph Bra'tac has. Stop a Jaffa character - Draw a card.

card.name: Carolyn Lam
card.property: Orion: Disease obstacles cost power +1 to play. Scorpius: Science obstacles cost power +1 to play. Orion and Scorpius, Pay 2 power - Turn a Science obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication). You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Cha'ra
card.property: Scorpius or Triangulum, Stop two Jaffa support characters - Gain 1 power. Scorpius and Triangulum, Stop Cha'ra - Jaffa support characters get skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Claire Tobias
card.property: Gemini or Libra: Claire Tobias gets experience +1 for each ten cards in your discard pile, up to a maximum experience bonus equal to her point value.

card.name: Francine Michaels
card.property: Francine Michaels gets experience +1 for each Libra and Orion glyph she has with a printed experience value of 1 or 2.

card.name: Harold Maybourne
card.property: Gemini, Stop Harold Maybourne - All other characters with no affiliation trait get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. Gemini and Pisces: Support characters with no affiliation trait cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Jacob Carter
card.property: Orion: You can use any Tok'ra character card to boost Jacob Carter. Pisces: You can use any SGC character card to boost Jacob Carter. Orion and Pisces: Jacob Carter gets Science +1 and Combat +1.

card.name: Jalen
card.property: Pisces or Triangulum: Each time you assign Jalen, you may take a Tok'ra card that costs equal to or less than the number of glyphs she has from your discard pile into hand. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Malcolm Barrett
card.property: Libra or Scorpius: Malcolm Barrett gets skills +1 for each promotion token he has. Libra and Scorpius, Stop Malcolm Barrett, pay 2 power - Each other team character gets skills +1 for each promotion token that character has.

card.name: Mimir
card.property: Gemini or Pisces, Stop Mimir - Place a lore token on a character (that token gives them the same benefits as having a glyph of your choice, though they didn't earn that glyph and it can't be moved). At the end of the mission phase, destroy all lore tokens created by Mimir.

card.name: Ruslan Chernovshev
card.property: Libra: Missions cost power -1 to play. Orion: Missions cost power -1 to play. Libra or Orion, Stop another team character - Ruslan Chernovshev gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Svetlana Markov
card.property: Each time Svetlana Markov earns a glyph, you may play a gear at no cost. Triangulum: Svetlana Markov gets skills +1 while she's assigned with another Russian or SGC team character.

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Libra or Scorpius: Each time you assign Teal'c, you may discard a Jaffa character card. If you do, the discarded character's skills are added to Teal'c's, until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Teyla Emmagan
card.property: Each time Teyla Emmagan earns a glyph she already has, you may move that glyph to another team character. If you do, choose one: ready them; or they gets skills +1 until the end of the turn. Libra or Orion: Each time you use Teyla Emmagan's first ability, you may pay 3 power to choose both effects.

card.name: Ambitious Plan
card.property: To play this event, stop a Tok'ra team character. If the current mission is a Combat mission, it becomes a Science mission. Purge this event.

card.name: Avenge the Dead
card.property: Choose a Jaffa team character who gets skills +1 for each support character who was destroyed this turn, until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Brainstorming
card.property: To play this event, stop three characters. Destroy an obstacle and all complications at the current mission. If at least two of the stopped characters are team characters, destroy all other obstacles as well.

card.name: Call to Action
card.property: To play this event, choose and stop a Jaffa team character. Ready a number of Jaffa support characters equal to the chosen character's Culture or Combat (you choose which).

card.name: Deception
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. Draw a card if the stopped character is Tok'ra. Purge this event. At the end of your opponent's next power phase, gain 2 power.

card.name: Hard-Earned Intelligence
card.property: TO play this event, stop a character. Look at your opponent's hand and choose a villain card (if any). Gain power equal to that card's cost. If the character you stopped is Tok'ra, your opponent discards the chosen card.

card.name: Legwork
card.property: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. They may discard it. If they don't, team characters gain skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Mobilization
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each failed mission this turn. Ready a character. Then, ready a Russian character for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Symbol of Unity
card.property: You can play this event only if your team characters have at least three different affiliation traits among them. Ready a team character. Team characters get skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: This Does Not Seem Wise
card.property: Ready a character. Until the end of the turn, they get skills -1 and "Failure: incapacitate this character."

card.name: Antarctica Base
card.property: At the end of your mission phase, you may place a card from your hand face down beneath this gear. At the end of your power phase, you may take any number of cards from beneath this gear into hand.

card.name: Naquadah Chest Bomb
card.property: Destroy this gear, stop and destroy a support character - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission that costs equal to or less than the support character's cost (+1 if they're Jaffa).

card.name: Stored Consciousness
card.property: Stop and destroy this gear - The next Asgard support character you play this turn costs power -2 to play. Stop and destroy this gear - Ready an incapacitated Asgard team character (they are no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Symbiote Tank
card.property: Stop this gear, purge a Tok'ra character card from your discard pile - Choose a character who gets skills +1 until the end of the turn. If they're not Tok'ra, incapacitate them at the beginning of your next debrief phase.

card.name: Tok'ra Science Lab
card.property: Each time you destroy an adversary, you may draw a card. If the destroyed adversary was Goa'uld, you may stop this gear and pay 1 power. If you do, place a card from your hand face down beneath this gear. You get 1 experience for each card beneath this gear.

card.name: Bounty Hunters
card.property: Outlaw, This obstacle gets difficulty +2 for each assigned character who has a bounty token.

card.name: Disclosure to the Media
card.property: While a Political adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets dominion. Failure: Incapacitate a hero ship.

card.name: Energy Weapon Strike
card.property: Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, destroy a support character.

card.name: Enzyme Withdrawal
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character and wound them twice. While they are wounded, they are blocked. To destroy wound tokens on that character, your opponent must pay 1 power for each wound token, in addition to any other costs.

card.name: Hooch Tastings
card.property: Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Ingenuity): Each character who has 1 Ingenuity or less is blocked until the end of the current mission. The destruction of this obstacle doesn't unblock them.

card.name: In the Cross Hairs
card.property: Outlaw. When you play this obstacle, place a bounty token on a character who doesn't have one. (It costs 1 power to assign a character with a bounty token, or 2 power to destroy a bounty token.)

card.name: Jaffa Squadron
card.property: Failure: Stop a team character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat/Ingenuity): The current mission gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Masquerade
card.property: To play this obstacle, destroy a ready adversary. When you play this obstacle, search your hand and deck for an adversary whose cost is equal to or lower than the destroyed adversary's cost, play them at no cost, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: No Respite
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses an assigned or ready team character. They are blocked. Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Ori Ambush
card.property: When you play this obstacle, incapacitate an assigned team character. Then, prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat): Your opponent may pay 2 power. If they don't, stop a team character.

card.name: Perilous Data Transfer
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture/Science): You may pay 2 power. If you do, your opponent discards three cards at random.

card.name: Personnel Review
card.property: Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture): Political obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Planetary Collapse
card.property: When you play this obstacle, place four counters on it. Remove a counter from this obstacle each time you get to act. While there are none left on it, it gets difficulty +4. Failure: Destroy each assigned and stopped support character.

card.name: Retasked
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent places the current mission on the bottom of their mission pile and plays a new mission at no cost. Ready all assigned characters and adversaries. Destroy all obstacles and complications.

card.name: Space Mine Field
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready a villain ship, then prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat/Ingenuity): Until the end of the current mission, to assign a hero ship, your opponent must stop another hero ship or pay 1 power.

card.name: Stumped
card.property: Each character who has a glyph is blocked.

card.name: Stun Bomb
card.property: Failure: Your opponent must drain X, where X Is equal to the total number of assigned and stopped characters.

card.name: Superior Firepower
card.property: During this mission's ship battle, you get total firepower +1 (or +2 if all your assigned ships are Ori ships). Victory: Hero ships that would be incapacitated as a result of this mission's ship battle are destroyed instead.

card.name: Treachery
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may ready a Wraith adversary. Then, prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat/Ingenuity): Wound each ready team character once.

card.name: Vented Atmosphere
card.property: When you play this mission, incapacitate a team character. At the end of the current mission, stop that character (they are no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Wave after Wave
card.property: Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science/Combat): You may play a Replicator obstacle. If you do, it costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Whispers in the Mist
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character. They are blocked.

card.name: Wraith Brainwashing
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on an assigned support character and stop them. They become an adversary under your control, with no game text, no other traits, and skills +1. Their revive cost is 0, but you must stop a Wraith adversary to pay it. They can't be scored.

card.name: Midway Station
card.property: Each time you paly an SGC or Atlantis support character, you may stop this ship. If you do, gain 1 power. Stop and destroy this ship, discard your hand - Destroy an obstacle or assigned adversary at the current mission.

card.name: Teal'c's Tel'tak
card.property: Each time you assi9gn this ship, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a support character or a Jaffa character.

card.name: Nakai Fighter
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns a ship, you may draw a card. If Nakai Fighter was assigned, you may draw another.

card.name: Netan's Ha'tak
card.property: Outlaw. Stop this ship - Until the end of the current mission, each time you use the outlaw keyword, gain 1 power.
